storyInfo: During her first official mission with the Chun-qian rescue team, Mulberry is thrust into the middle of an unexpected and severe disaster. In the face of crisis, she overcomes her fears and tackles the job given to her.

attributes.content: L-Let's stop here. This mountain road is so twisty that if we keep driving, we might actually end up closer to those clouds.
Look, everyone else's stopped by the side of the road. There's nothing we can do but pray for the Catastrophe to float past us.
Ning-Ning, don't stick your head out the window. Just hold onto this talisman and keep yourself hidden.
Mom, Dad, is that really... a Catastrophe? B-But... why didn't the Catastrophe Messenger warn us?
Well, there are some disasters not even the Catastrophe Messengers can foresee.
Don't you worry, though, we'll be just fine... You'll get to grow up, Ning-Ning, as happy and peaceful as can be.
Woah... The wind's so strong...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: The good news is that the snow's stopped, and once the weather clears up, our search and rescue operation will go much easier.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: We're responding to a request by the Chamber of Commerce. According to their information, the last signal from the missing caravan came from their temporary winter camp, two hundred li to the north.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: But following the snowstorm last night, communications with the camp were cut off, and we've been tasked with confirming the situation.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Everyone, please double-check your equipment and confirm the condition of your protective gear.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: If there are no issues, load everything into the cars. The roads are slippery after it snows, so plan your route accordingly.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Um, excuse me, am I bringing enough emergency supplies to deal with frostbite and hypothermia?
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I don't have much practical experience, so I could only go by the textbook, but I'm not sure if I've overlooked anything...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: This is your first formal rescue operation, right?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Y-Yes! I'll do my best not to be a burden.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Haha, don't be so nervous. If you've already passed the training course and become a full-fledged member of Chun-qian, you should be more than prepared for this.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: O-Okay.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...Mhm, see, you've got plenty of all the right medicine and equipment.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: What's this, by the way?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Oh, um, that's a letter.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: When we left, you said that no matter how simple the operation might seem, we must always be prepared for the possibility of not making it back... So, um, I decided to write a letter to my parents.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh. I didn't mean it that seriously. But still, it's better to be prepared for the worst than not.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: ...Hwah?
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Feel that? My hands are pretty darn hot, right? My Originium Arts let me produce a little bit of heat.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: I noticed you've been shivering this whole time. Feeling a bit warmer now?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Oh, umm... Yes, but actually, that wasn't because of the cold...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Haha, don't worry about it. No need to thank me. If you're feeling better now, then let's get going.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: The current wind conditions will seriously impact the operation. When heading into the mountains for search and rescue, be sure to closely follow the guidelines and avoid making any rash decisions.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Captain, the snow's starting to pick back up again! This is nothing like the weather forecast!
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: The temporary camp is right around the corner. Once we reach it, we'll need to repair the comms station and confirm the situation with HQ.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: But, if this poor weather persists...
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: ...We might have to put the operation on hold.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Mhm. It'll delay our entrance into the camp.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Anybody... Is anybody there? ...Help...
Oh, over there!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...The rescue team? I, I made it long enough for help to arrive?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: ...Please! Save my parents! And the others from the caravan! They're still trapped under the snow!
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Don't worry. We're here to help.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Ning-Ning, he has signs of severe frostbite and needs both first-aid and food. Also check him for any fractures since there are signs of having taken a fall.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Right away!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Alright, you can relax now. Can you tell me where the other members of the caravan are?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: (Shakes head forcefully)
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: ...I don't know. Everyone got separated during the blizzard. I walked what seemed like forever, and finally found my way back to the camp alone.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: No idea what happened to anyone else...
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Um, to the best of your knowledge, did the blizzard cause an avalanche nearby?
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I... don't think so? I didn't hear anything like that.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: But... I can't say for sure... The wind was so loud, I could've missed it...
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: No, I'm sure they're still alive! They're all experienced caravanners! There's no way I'd be the only survivor!
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: (The squad leader isn't saying anything.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (The fierce wind is... so, so cold. My teeth won't stop chattering.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (With the current visibility, there's no way we'd be able to search for victims, not to mention the risks of heading deeper into the mountains.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (We can't fly any drones out there, we can't rely on radio signal scans, and we won't be able to see much with our searchlights.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (But if they are experienced caravanners, they must've done what they could to send out distress signals.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (If they've been consciously making signal banners, or carrying survival whistles and signal lights with them, they have a very good chance of being found.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Hey, don't get up yet! I'm not done with the check-up!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I'm already feeling better. I have to go look for them.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: No, don't! You've only just barely warmed up a little!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Also, you've sprained both your ankles! The only reason you don't feel anything is because of how badly frozen they are! Now sit back down!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I'm fine, I can handle myself. If you're not going to go rescue them, then I will.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Urgh...!
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: C-Captain, I've gotten the patient under control!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: But what should we do...? The missing people are still out there, waiting for our help.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...Is the communication base station back in operation yet?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Hold on... I'm getting a signal.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: Captain, we've managed to make contact with HQ, but the signal is extremely unstable.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: According to HQ's observational analysis, the snowfall will decrease over the next two hours, but beyond that, they can't say for sure.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: That's good enough.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Ning-Ning, stay here and keep an eye on the base station. Fix up the tents around the camp, and move the wounded inside.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Use the transceiver to stay in contact with us. We'll need to make decisions on-the-fly depending on the information we get from HQ.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: U-Understood!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Then, umm...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Come back safe.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Black rocks fall, carving a gash into the mountain.
Sand and stone pour from it like a waterfall, the terrible noise echoing through the valley.
The girl covers her mouth, blankly looking on as the cars on the road across the valley and the houses at the foot of the mountain all become submerged beneath the torrent of falling rocks.
Phew... That should do it.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Once the herbs take effect, the swelling should go down quickly. Your body temperature has already more or less returned to normal.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh, and you've been in starvation conditions for so long that your stomach might not be able to handle solid food right away. Let's get you a nutrient solution first, to at least restore your energy.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: We've also managed to restore comms with HQ, so all we have to do now is wait.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Mm... Thank you.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: (...The captain let me stay behind because she saw right away how scared I was.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (Of course, I realize my role here is important too, and someone has to do it. I don't have enough experience in making snap decisions, so I'm not suited for heading out in such dangerous conditions.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (But when I heard her give the order, my first reaction wasn't disappointment, but... relief.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (How can I call myself part of the rescue team like this? What do I have to show my parents, to prove I can go down this career path?)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh, um! Excuse me!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: S-Sorry! Please don't go to sleep just yet!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: We don't have any monitoring equipment on hand, so I have to directly observe your condition for the time being.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh... Okay. I'm just... really tired. I don't... want to sleep either.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: If I fall asleep now, I know I'll have nothing but nightmares.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Then, um, let's chat a little. My job is just to make sure the communication equipment stays stable, so it won't distract me or anything.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: That's... not a very encouraging expression.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: You're a professional, so give me your honest opinion. It's too late for the others, isn't it?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Huh? N-No, that's not it... A-Actually, I was thinking of something else entirely.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I can't believe I let my mind wander at a time like this.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh, no, I'm the one who should be apologizing.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: I can't exactly keep a cool head either. I even blew up at you earlier.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: I... I'm just really, really scared.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: To be honest, I wanted to prove that I was capable, that I wouldn't hold my parents back. That's why I insisted on going into these snowy mountains with their caravan.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: So, if something happened to them... wouldn't that make everything my fault?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Um, I think... nobody's to blame for the heavy snowfall.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: But still, I can't help but think that I'm responsible for all this.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: If not... who else could I blame? God?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: ...The wind sure is harsh.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Mhm... It sure is.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Actually... I think I can relate a little. My parents didn't want me taking this job either. They said it was dangerous, what with how 'the elements are unpredictable,' and all that.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: So I snuck off by myself. All this time, and they haven't even sent me a single letter.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: If something were to happen to me, and the letter I left taken back to my hometown... To be honest, I have no idea how they'd react.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...I don't want to think about it either.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Ning-Ning! Ning-Ning! Do you read me?
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: Ah, yes, I'm here!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Please report back to HQ: We've found traces of entrapment under deep snow, with thermal imaging signatures from beneath. No response to calls.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: We need HQ to help us come up with a rescue plan.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Temperature... Wind speed... Entrapment depth... Snowfall conditions... Okay, I've got everything!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I just contacted HQ, and members from the rear technical team should be on duty right now, so I'll pass on the message!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Also, the snow will intensify again partway through the night, so make sure to come back in time.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Did you hear that? The northwestern team seems to have found someone!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...Oh, asleep already? I hope I wasn't talking too loud.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Mm, his vital signs are stable, so it should be fine.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: He's earned his rest.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Now to call HQ
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Crap, crap! The signal cut off! That gust of wind just now must've interfered with the base station...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Gu Ning-Ning cannot help but cast a glance at the sleeping victim, and then at the wireless transceiver in her hand.
She is now completely alone, alone with the howling wind.
(Shakes head forcefully) Stop trembling! Don't you dare! Don't you dare think about calling the others back to bail you out either!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Forget these unnecessary thoughts. Tell everyone there's been an interruption in the signal, then hurry up and fix it!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: *exhales*... Okay. Searchlight, protective goggles, non-slip gloves, safety rope. No problems there. This situation was explained in the manual.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Next up is...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Gu Ning-Ning takes out the letter from her luggage and slips it into her pocket.
(The camp is sheltered from the wind, but the base station is atop a hill... If I'm remembering right, it should be this way.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (Ugh... The wind is so strong that I can't see anything but blowing snow in front of me.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (Oh no... That means the people still out there are in even more danger!)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (That's why... I, I absolutely can't panic. If I mess this up... If I make any sort of mistake...)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (No, stop it! Just watch your step, and don't let your eyes wander!)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...Oh, I think I see the outline of the base station. Good, the damage doesn't look too severe.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: C-Captain! Reporting in!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: There's no sign of external damage to the base station! I'll go check on the antenna!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Good. Be careful when climbing up there.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Phew... Checking the fulcrum, adjusting the position of the safety rope...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (It's freezing...)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (The moment I looked up, my goggles were completely covered with snow, and I can't see anything...)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (How much further is the top of the tower? How long have I been climbing? In training, I've climbed dozens of meters, but it never felt this long...)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (The support... is it about to get blown over by the wind? Or is that just my legs shaking?)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (The transceiver keeps beeping. It should be the teams confirming their safety with one another. If I waste any more time here, am I putting them all in danger...?)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (No, no! What am I thinking? I'm not nervous, I'm not nervous...)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (I just need to figure out how to solve this problem. That's right, I can fix this!)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (The safety rope is secure. I double-checked it before I started.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (If I slip, I just need to make sure I control my bearings, to minimize the risk of sliding down the hill.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: (Just stay focused and take it one step at a time. Everything will be fine.)
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...I feel it! Reporting in, Captain! I've reached the top!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Now checking the fault light prompts to determine the position of the failed circuitry!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Good. I'm here to assist you in remote troubleshooting if you need it.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: U-Understood!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Don't panic. We're all relatively safe for now. The second team has located two missing persons and brought them back to camp.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Once you're back, you can divvy up the workload.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: You're doing a great job.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: ...Okay!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Phew, I've managed to calm this lady down too.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: None of the rescue victims seem to be in critical condition, which is great news.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh, the sun's rising.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: The weather will be clearing up shortly too. Once the sun's out, our rescue operations will be significantly easier.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: Hah! I'm feeling motivated again! Let me head out with the third team and see what the situation's like.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Member

attributes.content: Okay, please be careful!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...They're still not back yet?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: P-Please don't get up and walk on your own! I only applied emergency treatment; you'll still have to rest so your injuries can heal.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I'm sure one of us in Chun-qian will bring back good news soon, so please hold on a bit longer.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: How long has it been since you guys last slept?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Huh? Umm... Just one all-nighter? It's totally fine. With how dire the situation's been, it's not like I'd be able to sleep anyway.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Besides, saving lives is more important. I think everyone's been pretty tense. Even the ones in HQ's support team haven't had time to rest.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: But don't worry, we won't mess this rescue operation up!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Mm... Thank you.
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: By the way, why did you decide to join the rescue squad? To prove yourself to your parents?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Umm, no, that's not it... It's because when I was very little, I saw a Catastrophe firsthand.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: But... I don't actually remember what was going through my head at the time. After all, Catastrophes are still terrifying to me, even now...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Ning-Ning, prepare the warming measures!
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Okay, got it!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Be careful when moving these two into their sleeping bags. We did our best to keep them warm in the open air, but they're still extremely frail.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: Father! Mother!
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: So those are your parents! That's great!
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Thank you so much! Thank you!
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: We... managed to save these people.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Right, back then...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: The girl thought her father would soon reach over to cover her eyes with his large hand; that her mother would tell her how terrible Catastrophes are, and that children ought not see or think about them lest they have nightmares.
But instead, they sighed and took her hand.
'Ning-Ning, just remembering these Catastrophes is already a very brave thing to do.'
The only thing I could think of back then was... how scared I was. Sad. Powerless. But I still wanted to remember. I wanted to make the misery brought by calamity less painful.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...That's what my mom and dad taught me.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: ...Father, Mother, can you hear me?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: I'll rub your hands for you, you'll warm up in no time...
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Please stay calm and let us handle the first aid. Your parents still need to rest and recover before they'll be able to respond to you.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: And that should pretty much wrap up our search and rescue operation. Judging from the other teams' reports, they've located all the missing persons, choosing the most effective rescue methods for each situation.
attributes.name: Rescue Squad Leader

attributes.content: That's fantastic... Looks like this letter won't be needed either.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Phew... Finally, a moment of relief.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Oh right... Excuse me...
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Young Victim

attributes.content: Gu Ning-Ning opens the envelope with her home address written on it.
There is nothing inside except for a small talisman.
Um, th-this is a kind of protective charm, like a prayer for peace and prosperity.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I hope that you, your parents, and everyone else in the caravan can have a speedy recovery.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: I was planning on bringing it back with me, but I think it'd be better to pass this hope on.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning

attributes.content: And instead... I should probably write a proper letter.
attributes.name: Gu Ning-Ning
